dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 399 IH: Small Business Advocacy Improvements Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Luetkemeyer (for himself and Mr. Carter of Louisiana) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To clarify the primary functions and duties of the Office of Advocacy of the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Advocacy Improvements Act of 2023.

section.header: Amendment to primary functions and duties of the Office of Advocacy of the Small Business Administration

subsection.text: Section 202 of Public Law 94–305 (15 U.S.C. 634b) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by inserting and the international economy after economy;
in paragraph (9), by striking complete and inserting compete; and
in paragraph (12), by striking serviced-disabled and inserting service-disabled.

subsection.text: Section 203(a) of Public Law 94–305 (15 U.S.C. 634c) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (5), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (6), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

represent the views and interests of small businesses before foreign governments and international entities for the purpose of contributing to regulatory and trade initiatives which may affect small businesses.
